version_description:
We've made some general improvements & bug fixes.

Have questions or feedback? We want to hear from you! Write to us at:
lightwave.support@lightricks.com

P.S. If you love Lightwave, we'd be thankful if you rated us!

If you’ve already been enjoying Beatleap, you’ll love everything we’ve added!

You can now:
• Add new exciting effects such as Fast Cut, Boomerang and Speed.
• Adjust the duration of your videos.
• Apply stunning new filters.
• Get in the right Mood by adjusting the pace of cuts.
• Trim Music to the section you want to hear.
• Replace clips & music easily.

We’re just waiting to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!
Yours,
The Beatleap team

If you’ve already been enjoying Beatleap, you’ll love everything we’ve added!

You can now:
• Add new exciting effects such as Fast Cut, Boomerang and Speed.
• Adjust the duration of your videos.
• Apply stunning new filters.
• Get in the right Mood by adjusting the pace of cuts.
• Trim Music to the section you want to hear.
• Replace clips & music easily.

We’re just waiting to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!
Yours,
The Beatleap team

If you’ve already been enjoying Beatleap, you’ll love everything we’ve added!

You can now:
• Import your own music !
• Change the format of the video.
• Add exciting effects such as Fast Cut, Boomerang and Speed.
• Adjust the duration of your videos.
• Apply stunning new filters.
• Get in the right Mood by adjusting the pace of cuts.
• Trim Music to the section you want to hear.
• Replace clips & music easily.

We’re just waiting to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!
Yours,
The Beatleap team

Hello Beatleapers!

We've made some general improvements & bug fixes.

We'd love to hear more of your feedback at beatleap.support@lightricks.com and can't wait to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!

Yours,
The Beatleap team

Hello Beatleapers!

We've made some general improvements & bug fixes.

We'd love to hear more of your feedback at beatleap.support@lightricks.com and can't wait to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!

Yours,
The Beatleap team

Hello Beatleapers!

We've made some general improvements & bug fixes.

We'd love to hear more of your feedback at beatleap.support@lightricks.com and can't wait to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!

Yours,
The Beatleap team

Hello Beatleapers!

We've made some general improvements & bug fixes.

We'd love to hear more of your feedback at beatleap.support@lightricks.com and can't wait to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!

Yours,
The Beatleap team

Hey Beatleapers!
Ready for an even quicker editing experience? You’ll now be able to pick your videos by album. Find everything, as you’ve already organized it.
We also squashed a few bugs while we were at it. Can’t wait to see some new videos!
Yours,
The Beatleap Team

Hey Beatleapers,

With this release, we're bringing you one of your most popular requests. That's right, you can now custom order your clips!

If this is exactly what you were looking for, we'd love it if you'd give us a shoutout with #beatleap. And as always keep sending your requests our way!

We've also added an elegant fade to give your videos a more natural ending, and worked out a few other small kinks.

There's more in store, so get out there and shoot some videos ;)

Yours,
The Beatleap Team

Happy Holidays from the Beatleap Team!
In the spirit of the holidays, we’ve added some festive filters and music.
We hope they help you spread some cheer and warmth with the videos you create.

Yours,
The Beatleap Team

Hello Beatleapers!

We've made some general improvements & bug fixes.

We'd love to hear more of your feedback at beatleap.support@lightricks.com and can't wait to see how you relive your memories. Enjoy!

Yours,
The Beatleap team

Hello Beatleapers!

In this update, we’ve added the option to import your music from Files! We’ve also squashed some bugs and added some improvements.

We'd love it if you'd give us a shoutout with #beatleap. And as always keep sending your requests our way!

Yours,
The Beatleap Team

亲爱的Beatleap 用户：
很快就是春节啦！
在本版本更新中，我们给大家带来了一些【国风歌单】，给您的创作更添节日氛围～
同时，我们也非常高兴带来了【调整】功能！在此工具中，您可以轻松替换时间轴上不同点显示的视频，以及选择喜欢的视频片段。
新年快乐！
Beatleap 团队

Hey Beatleapers, we’ve got great news!

Spring is time for renewal, so we’re bringing you some fun new TapTaps in the Edit tab to add even more variety to your videos. If you’ve been waiting for SloMo, Black Fade, and Jump Cuts, this update is for you.

We’ve also adjusted and improved the Mood feature. The number of cuts and edits applied varies with each Mood, giving you options for different feels.

Got more requests? We'd love to hear more of your feedback at beatleap.support@lightricks.com!

Yours,
The Beatleap Team

In this update, we’ve added the option to set the filter opacity level! We’ve also squashed some bugs and added some improvements.

We'd love it if you'd give us a shoutout with #beatleap. And as always keep sending your requests our way!

Yours,
